channel.title: Microconf Europe 2018
channel.description:
The location and date of Microconf Europe 2018 has been announced:
Location: Dubrovnik, Croatia Dates: 21 October - 23 October (Sunday - Tuesday)
https://www.microconfeurope.com

item.title: Microconf Europe 2018
item.dc:creator: LTR
item.description:
Who is going?

I went 2013, 2014 and 2015. Great experience each time, learned a lot and met interesting people, some of whom I’m still in contact with.

Can’t go this year so I’m selling my ticket rather cheaply - perhaps that is useful to anyone here.

Read full topic
